subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Kiefer routed seventh-seeded James Blake, 6-1, 6-2, in advancing to the semifinals of the Rogers Cup in Toronto. Kiefer, ranked 37th in the world, will play Gilles Simon, who defeated Marin Cilic, 3-6, 6-2, 6-3. Kiefer and Simon are the unlikely victors in a bracket that featured Roger Federer, Nikolay Davydenko, Andy Roddick and Blake.
